product_name: ST. D'VENCE Winter Edition Body Lotion with Tea Tree Oil and Shea Butter for Dry Skin
review: HI THEREI have a sensitive & a bit dry skin so very choosy in buying any beauty product.I have been using ST DVENCI winter edition moisturiser for the past several months now.I'm going to share my experience & personal  views on this product &of course that might vary from one customer to the other .BOTTLE PACKAGINGBottle looks neat & attractive with a pump.But, as many customers pointed out the last 40 ml of cream is below the pump & getting it out is nuisance & irritating.WHAT'S INSIDE THE BOTTLETea tree ,jojoba & vitamin E oill ,shea butter,  alovera are some of the main ingredients.The cream is thick, creamy and spreads real quick on the skin.No sticky / oily feel.The fragrance is extremely pleasant.WHEN TO USE?Ideally after bath when our skin is still moistIS IT EFFECTIVE?Personally for me very effective. My skin looks soft, supple & thoroughly hydrated. It nourishes my skin from deep inside.Real quality product.Many reviewers have written how this is ideal for winter & for dry skinned people.According to me this moisturiser is also extremely suitable for MATURE SKIN (above 38+) I'm 40+ & by far this is the ideal cream I have ever come across.ANY NEGATIVES?Apart from the pump that doesn't allow the last 40 mls of cream out,none.FINAL WORDThick ,fragrant cream. Easy to use.My skin simply responded very well to this product.One can feel how well it nourishes the skin with in 3 to 4 days of usage.300 ml botte lasts approximately 45 to 50 days .(moderate use)Would I recommend this if you are interested in buying? Most certainly yes! Would I buy again? Yep.In fact i have already purchased 3 bottles.REVIEW UPDATE ON 24.02.2020My fourth bottle has a pump that's lengthier than the previous ones. Now, the cream can be pumped almost fully. I would like to give full credit to the manufacturers for listening to the consumer's feedback, act & increase the length of the pump. A simple but very effective improvement. Well Done!One more thing-  this cream is no longer for very dry skin people but for dry skin. The difference is now, it doesn't give long hours of moisturizing effect like before.HOPE THIS REVIEW IS USEFUL TO YOU

review: I found it very good moisturizer. A comparison may be more helpful:-Moisturizing power:Coconut oil>Jac Olivol>Keokarpin body oil>Vaseline intensive care>Parachute deep nourish (Parachute deep nourish can moisturize mild dry skin for a day)-Stickiness:Parachute deep nourish<Vaseline intensive care<Keokarpin body oil<Jac Olivol<Coconut oil (Parachute deep care instantaneously gets absorbed in skin)-Fragrence:Parachute deep nourish>Jac Olivol>Keokarpin body oil>Coconut oil>Vaseline intensive care (Parachute deep nourish has good but intense smell, Smell of Keokarpin body oil is pleasant, personally I don't like the smell of Jac Olivol)Thickness:Vaseline intensive care (Lotion)>Parachute deep nourish(Lotion)>Coconut oil>Jac Olivol(Oil)=Keokarpin body oil-Ease of application:Parachute deep nourish>Vaseline intensive care>Keokarpin body oil=Jac Olivol>Coconut oil-Required amount:Coconut oil<Keokarpin body oil<Jac Olivol<Vaseline intensive care<Parachute deep nourish (Good amount of Parachute deep nourish is required, so it will get finished fast.)

review: I have been using parashute products since my childhood. I have always loved their products. I am in love with this product as well.  Parachute Advansed Body Lotion - DEEP NOURISH is specially crafted for extra dry skin. It provides deep nourishment. It is enriched with goodness of Coconut Milk & 100% Natural moisturizers. Its COCOLIPID TM FORMULA goes 10 layers deep to boost your natural glow.  It penetrates the skin cells and locks in moisture; thus strengthening the skin barrier from within unlike some other lotions which are only occulent.  Non-sticky fast absorbing formula with unique moisture lock technology that prevents moisture loss enriched with Coconut Milk & 100% Natural moisturizing properties, nourishes the skin making it soft and supple all day long. Helps retain skin's natural moisture. And its fragrance.  Apply the Parachute Advansed Deep Nourish Body Lotion generously all over your body after a bath or shower or before you go for a sweet night sleep and massage in circular motions, paying special attention to any dry areas.  Worth trying product. Give it a try. All the best for your purchase.ü§óü§óü§óü§óüôÇüôÇüôÇüôÇ

product_name: NIVEA Hand Cream, Soothing Glycerin & Olive, 75ml
review: I am a hand cream hoarder and i have tried hand creams from every price range and I can safely add this one to my top 5 handcreams. Just to tell you a bit about my preference in creams, I have sweaty palms and when I apply handcreams it gets a lot worse, so I look for crems that are hydrating and non greas. Due to a lot of hand washing my hands feel very dry and I go over hand creams like water. So I was looking for a affordable and better quality hand cream and thought of ordering this one. This hand cream has a perfect consistency it's not too runny and not too thick either. Comes in a tube packaging which I prefer because that very hygiene. It has mild but pleasent fragrance that lingers for hours and it's not too overpowering for fragrance sensitive people. The cream gets absorbed into your hands quickly and you need just a bit of it. If you have extremely dry hands you might need bit more than usual quantity as its very light cream for that matter. You get 75 ml of crems for 90 rupees which is a very great price for the quantity and compared to other brands its very very reasonable. This lasts me a month or so with all my excessive washing but it depends on your personal usage totally. Its manufactured in Germany. You can look at ingredients list in the pics I've attached.Overall i'd repurchase this product again for sure. Very resonable and effective.

product_name: NIVEA Hand Cream, Soothing Glycerin & Olive, 75ml

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Fresh Body Lotion, 400 ml
review: I have dry skin that needs moisturizer  at all seasons.Even in summer,the AC dehydrates the skin so much that my dry skin is getting scaly with dryness like in winterüò≥ I needed a very good moisturizer coz my baby's Himalayan baby lotion is so light that it has no affect on my dry adult skin!So I ordered this as I vaguely remember using it once and liking it's fragrance.( I usually order Vaseline lotions for my mom whose fragrances I didn't like much).I received this and it's fragrance didn't disappoint. It's mild and lovely.As for it's moisturizing property,it's working nicely on my dry skin. My skin feels and looks lot better now. But the real litmus test will be in winter,when my very dry skin will tell how good this really is!The ingredients in this lotion includes Tapioca starch; the ingredient used in moisturizers that gives it's non greasy effect. So this lotion really does have a non greasy feeling.I bought this for a deal price of Rs.211. well worth it.Shelf life also very good,expiring in 2021.But I'm giving 4 stars as my initial impression was not good because I received a broken pump,I didn't find the broken part in the package which means it was packed broken and not a transit damage.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Fresh Body Lotion, 400 ml
review: ¬†Vaseline is no longer the sticky moist oily cream of the past.It stands to the test of time.This aloe vera flavour is having pleasant mild aroma with sufficient moisturising capacity and smooth less oily appearance at the same time.Buying from Amazon specially in deal time is rewarding.I bought it @ 224/-.Packaging and delivery was standard.Do watch my unboxing video and pictures as well.Recommended purchase.Thank you.

product_name: Mamaearth Skin Repair Natural Winter Body Lotion with Mango & Kokum butter for Women & Men with Extra Dry Skin
review: Knock knock!!! Winter is approaching  &  I need the best moisturiser for my skin. What to do :-). Actually I am always reacting like that whenever the season changes and time to choose some skin care. My skin is very sensitive so I always do prefer finding something pure and less chemical inside. For a moment chemicals may give you the expected result and make your skin brighter but eventually it deliberately reduses the immunity power of your skin. So finding the good moisturiser for winter care is not an easy task in all terms especially for me. That literally makes me so confused because a lot of famous brands with lots of commitments with guarantee ' lol..When I choose this Mamaearth winter care lotion I was slightly hesitant and trust me it is so amazin. The best part of it which I found i.e. it does not make your skin greecey. Despite making my skin very soft & glow in this cold it feels very lighter and it's fragrance is also too good. Overall I am loving it! Thank you for reading my review :-) Bye!*Please click the Helpful button if you like this review. Thank you!

review: It smells good, definitely not greasy.Stays moisturised for a long time after bath.I use this body lotion for winter season. This holds the moisture. And got at a great discounted price.Product is nice best and most affordable moisturizer and thank you Amazon delivery was fastGood product from vasline, its smells great and a good moisturizing lotion for all age group. Go for it.I have a dry skin and this works great on them.The odour is also pleasant and comparatively with nivea this is somewhat thick and non greeasy!Using it since a year.I really liked the chocolaty smell of this moisturizer really great and very good for skin and the discount here is amazing.It was amazing deal.I got 50 % discount.Very Smooth cream bash lotion.Delivered very fast befor time.Happy to got this. Its original product if you want to check please scan barcode given on bottle..if you are looking for best winter body lotion on Amazon then Cocoa glow is best choice fit in budget and quite impressive..thanks to Amazon for delivering within two days and well protective covering.Thanks. Please click on helpful bar if you find my review helpful..stay blessed..see image which I have attached.Vaseline Intensive care cocoa glow lotion is best suited for dry skin in winter. It's light and non-greasy and gets absorbed within a few seconds. It as a strong chocolate fragrance and while applying everybody in the house will know about it due to the strong scent. The fragrance is more like liquid dairy milk chocolate.If you have extreme dry skin, please go for Vaseline Intensive care Advanced Reapair (white bottle) lotion or Nivea body milk (navy blue bottle) which is meant to repair extreme dry skin. Oh!! Doesn't matter how many body lotion i use, this will stand out all of them.Maybe the main reason it's delicious scent. Couldn't have been better.Moisturisation, outstanding, grease-free and the best part is longetivity. I just have to apply every morning after bath and I'm done. No need to reapply. Last until I get back to my bed. (Sometimes not that long, but it's okay). I just don't have to use more than 6 pumps for my whole body. So, thumbs up for this packaging.And at end of review, i would thank amazon for good packaging and delivery.

product_name: Biotique Bio Wheat Germ FIRMING FACE and BODY NIGHT CREAM For Normal To Dry Skin, 50G
review: I bought this for rs156 . And quite frankly I wasn't hoping for much because of the cost and my other failures with biotque and other skin products.I bought this in November , as it was getting very cold and my skin was becoming drier everyday and rough. So decided to use this night cream.I have oily to normal combination skin and prone to acne. So was skeptical about this product as not very many skin products suit me.So I'm writing this review after using the product for a good two months . I've used it almost every night.  It's really good. Like the formulation is very light and keeps the skin hydrated. And in the morning the skin feels extremely soft. You just need a small amount and even after using it for 2 months  almost everyday, more than half is remaining. I'm quite happy with the product. And I'll reuse it obviously. Also I just use to to avoid dryness of the skin and make my skin smother.

product_name: Biotique Bio Wheat Germ FIRMING FACE and BODY NIGHT CREAM For Normal To Dry Skin, 50G
review: Unlike other creams, Himalaya Bio Wheat Germ is a quick absorbing & heavy cream. It's best suitable for dry & extra dry skin type. It's meant to be used at night. Using at day time while going outside may make your face look oily. This cream has light nice aroma which is soothing.People having oily skin & acne issues - stay away from this.I'm have a extra dry skin. I use this combo in winter: Ponds lite cream at day and Himalaya wheat germ cream at night.

product_name: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry Touch Sunblock SPF 50+ Sunscreen For Women And Men, 30ml
review: I have read many reviews of this product who say that they have received expired product. I want to clarify it. The date written on the FRONT SIDE CRIMP of the tube is not the expiry date but the MANUFACTURED DATE. The expiry date and batch number are written on the back side crimp of the tube. Please check properly before giving negative feedback as it can hamper the reputation of the seller.

product_name: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry Touch Sunblock SPF 50+ Sunscreen For Women And Men, 30ml
review: my face is oily and acne prone and I tried a lot of sunscreens I mean it A LOT! I never consider repurchasing any of them. They broke me out, left a white sheet on my face or were too oily.¬†As a person with oily skin I've been searching for a good sunscreen that won't leave me looking shiny and greasy an hours after applying. This stuff is it. I apply this sunscreen, then dust my face in loose powder and have no problem staying matte for the majority of my day.but i felt that some shiny look without applying compact or loose powder on top.and it's doesn't give that super dooper matte finish anymore.@ double thumbsup üëçüëç for amazon for fast and neat delivery

product_name: StBotanica Moroccan Argan Oil Hand and Nail Cream, 50g - For Soft, Smooth Hands & Strong Lustrous Nails
review: Argan oil is an organic product extracted from the kernels of the argan tree, which is native to Morocco. It is extremely rich in beneficial nutrients including fatty acids and vitamin E. Its properties make it particularly beneficial for the hair and skin, which makes it a popular cosmetic choice for many celebrities. It‚Äôs not just for the rich and famous, though ‚Äì anyone can reap the argan oil benefits for their body.The cream is very hydrating. Sometimes My hand became dry, after using this my hand feels very soft and hydrated. The moisturize easily penetrate my skin.It has Moroccan Argan Oil, Argan oil soothes afflicted skin and promotes healing. It also has Olive Oil, Jojoba oil and plant butter such as cocoa butter and shea butter which moisturize my hand very deeply. And maintain skin hydration. It has Licorice which is a good skin lightening agent.The most important fact is I love to maintain big nails. Because I love nail art. But my nail breaks down again and again. I use this cream daily in my nail cuticles. The amino acids of Argan Oil and protein molecules easily penetrate the surface of the nails and provide strength. Easily absorbed and made my skin glow a bit. After using this my nails are not dry and fizzy anymore.- - Vitamin C helps to get soft smooth beautiful hand and strong shiny nails.- - Deeply moisturize hands.- - Slowly it reduces the darkness and pigmentation of the skin.- - Help to get soft cuticles and strong nails.--It is a fully Organic product.--It has pure natural oils.--It does not contains any harmful chemicals.--It does not have Sulphates.--It is Paraben-free.--It is also Silicon free.--It does not have any kind of Mineral oils.

product_name: Indus Valley Bio Organic Non-Toxic Aloe Vera Gel for Acne, Scars, Glowing & Radiant Skin Treatment-175ml
review: Winters are here and so is the season of dry skin and chapped lips.Moisturising your skin is most essential during winters to prevent ageing and uneven skin tones. It also keeps you fresh all day and increases your work capacity.Oily creams and moisturisers may be unacceptable to some and may cause breakouts in some others. I have acne problem and so I remain very careful in what I apply on my skin.While searching for a good skin care routine product, I came across this aloe gel formula from Indus Valley. I ordered it because the packaging was vintage ( I love vintagggeeee).The biggest advantages about this product:* easy to incorporate in your day to day skin care. If you have to apply the original aloe from the leaves, it will take some time to cut, wash, peel the leaves. It might not be the best idea for your busy schedule.* It is not oily at all* Made from natural product. Does not contain any chemicals or toxic substances* Has a very nice aroma.I am presenting to you some of the ways, I love to use aloe gel in my day to day routine. Hope you like it too.Aloe gel has Vitamin E which acts as an antioxidant and a natural nutrient for your skin.* Over the night moisturiser: Apply a teaspoonful of gel on your face and massage thoroughly. Leave it overnight to get a soft skin in the morning.* Morning moisturiser: After washing your face, use aloe gel to soothe your skin and before going out. This protects the delicate skin from the harsh sunrays, pollution and dry air.* Body lotion: You can use it to apply on your hands and legs in general as a good moisturiser.* Hair mask: Mix it with a little amount of curd and prepare a paste. Apply it on your hair from roots to tips. Leave it for 1 hour and then wash it usually. This conditions and strengthens your hair. Alternately you can also apply the raw aloe gel to avail the same benefits. Do this once every 2 weeks.So these are some of the ways, I like to use Aloe gel in my routine. If you guys have some novel ways, do let me know. I would love to try that.And thats the end of it! Hope you enjoyed it! product_name: Olay Natural White Light Instant Glowing Fairness Cream, 40g
review: This moisturizer instantly brightens up the skin & deeply hydrates it while providing sun protection. It works like a BB cream + moisturizer + sunscreen in one. It does temporarily leave a white cast on the skin just like sunscreens do, but it settles down after a couple of minutes. On days you don't feel like applying a BB cream or foundation, you can just use this moisturizer & set it with your compact - you'll be good to go.

product_name: Olay Natural White Light Instant Glowing Fairness Cream, 40g
review: I use Olay products for years and recently started using Olay natural white light instant glowing fairness cream. As per the name instant fairness cream, gives instant glow after applying it. It makes a thin white layer on face after applying it and face looks bright.If used regularly, over the period of time this cream helps to reduce dark spots and makes skin fair. It claims to get the natural glow, but I didn't find glow on my face. I have fair skin and thus needs very less quantity of cream as I look whitish after using more quantity of cream. But I'm sure this cream will be perfect for people with darker skin tone. One more feature about the product is, it comes in travel-friendly packaging so it can be used while traveling as well. I liked this product and its value for money.

product_name: Olay Natural White Light Instant Glowing Fairness Cream, 40g
review: This cream smoothens out well when applied and doesn‚Äôt cluster by any kind of light and smooth with a sweet calming scent, which is exceptionally mesmerising .What I like the most about the cream is that it leaves the skin extremely delicate and smooth.It makes for an ideal base for applying cosmetics.I noticed a bright change in my composition after application. My family and friend were ready to compliment it.it dosent contain any bleachThis cream lightens your skin toneit evens out your skin toneit provides sun protection to give healthy looking glowit nourishes your skin deep withinIt might work wonders for you too!!

product_name: Olay Natural White Light Instant Glowing Fairness Cream, 40g
review: I am fan of this moisturiser, as it claims it gives an instant glowing fair skin.It protect skin from harmful uv rays and keep skin well moisturised throug out the day.I am totally in love with this product and highly recommend it to all the beauties out there.Mine is normal to oily skin.

product_name: Olay Natural White Light Instant Glowing Fairness Cream, 40g
review: Olay Natural White Light Instant Glowing Fairness, 40gmSkin Type : Combination Skin.This one is a miracle in a small tube.First thing : I absolutely love, how it comes in a tube, which is convenient to carry in your  purse or bagAfter washing face, and this one, it instantly gives a soft glow to the skin.It has also helped to even out my skin tone.I am applying this as a night cream, while it gives a really beautiful glow in the morning.

product_name: Pears Naturale Nourishing Coconut Water Bodywash, 250 ml
review: I never liked Pears soaps because I didn't find their smell good. And to add to that, I never liked anything which had coconut in it.I had earlier tried other 3 Pears body washes and those were good but not extraordinary. Those too had some Pears soap frangrance which I did not like.These three new Pears Naturale body washes looked good and I ordered all three. When I received these, these didn't have any company sealing. These have 2 and half years of shelf life.I wasn't expecting much from this coconut body wash but contrary to what I was expecting, this is perhaps the first coconut product I really liked.It is crystal clear, lathers very well with a little quantity and frangrance is very good which remains with you for a few minutes, and that is good.Not sure if this product has any harmful chemicals or not but it has not caused any skin issue so far.At this price, it is a 5 star product for sure.The pomegranate one is good as well. But the aloe vera one even though lathers and cleans well but it does not have good fragrance.

product_name: Pears Naturale Nourishing Coconut Water Bodywash, 250 ml
review: I have already choosed gentle and mild products for my skin as it's very sensitive. I have used pears soap since years. Recently I came across this super amazing pears natural√© nourishing coconut water bodywash. I thought of giving it a try as it's dermatologically tested and 100% soap free. It has nice sweet and decent coconut water fragrance and makes you feels fresh after shower. It also makes your skin smooth, soft and glowing. This body wash is 98% glycerin along with honey. It makes it a natural wash because along with natural coconut water it also contains many fruit's juices like orange, lemon, strawberry, peach & apple. Getting so much natural in such amount of price is just worth. Must recommend for those who looking for natural body wash.

product_name: Pears Naturale Nourishing Coconut Water Bodywash, 250 ml
review: Hi,Pears naturale coconut water body wash is an amazing product. I have used many body washes but I would say this one is the best I have used so far. It has all natural ingredients with main ingredients as honey and glycerine. It has a very very long lasting fragnance. It leaves the skin very soft, gentle and fragrant. Hindustan unilever has come up with a great product. My whole family is really loving the product.  Just a little amount of the bodybwash gives a good lather and foam. I would highly recommend everyone to try this product to have a very refreshing bathing experience. A must buy I would say!

product_name: Pears Naturale Nourishing Coconut Water Bodywash, 250 ml
review: Pears has been in service of all the beautiful skins globally since ages. As I have a sensitive skin I am using pears when I was a kid. My skin was very sensitive towars changing weather, cosmetic products etc. My doctor asked me to use pears and since then till now Pears is my most trusted brand.This bodywash of Pears combines all the natural goodness of coconut and honey with added extract of apple, orange etc. One can literally feel the fragrance of each individual component. The most amazing thing is that it does not contain any added colour, it is a absolutely transparent bodywash. One can see through it. Pears is always a glycerine based product and assured to keep it quality control entact. It did not dried out my skin leaving it soft and fragrant.Fragrance is totally magical one (although it doesn't stays long) it will soothe your senses while bathing. If you have a stressful time,it will make you feel better. Another thing which I will share is that in the age of pollution and impurities Pears have looked forward to a whole new natural range. The packing of the bottle is amazing. I honestly loved it. Hope you guys will love the product. If you are thinking whether to go for this or not then I would say it will be better if you purchase it once.

product_name: Pears Naturale Nourishing Coconut Water Bodywash, 250 ml
review: Pears soap bar has always been my favourite.And now Pears coming up with their new range of body washesSo I ordered this New pears natural coconut water nourishing body wash which has the goodness of 100 percent natural ingredients, natural coconut water, pure glycerine and natural oils, to give you soft, smooth, glowing skin .This body wash felt gentle and mild on body plus it does not have harmful chemicals..it cleans the body and nourishes the skin..with each bath u get a very fresh and soft feeling which lifts up the mood and the skin doesn't even feel dry...the fragrance..i completely love the feel I get after every bath..no wastage...and much more hygienic than soap bars..This New pears natural coconut water nourishing body wash is dermatologically tested to be mild on skin. I agreeüôÇ and would recommend.

product_name: Pears Naturale Nourishing Coconut Water Bodywash, 250 ml
review: I used Pears coconut water body wash for the first time and the fragrance is nice like some fruit smell. It makes the skin soft and smoth .As per the information given on the product it is made of pure glycerin and hiney .it gives your fresh feeling after bath. Leaves your skin soft and fresh. The small quantity of the body wash is enough to create lather.  I loved the product and recommend it to others too. I have combination skin and it suited my skin very well.

product_name: Pears Naturale Nourishing Coconut Water Bodywash, 250 ml

product_name: Himalaya Clear Complexion Day Cream, 50g
review: I have been using this cream for 3 years and it has fetched wonderful results for me. I have dry skin. So, after cleansing and toning my face, I use a bit of moisturizer on my face, especially to keep the areas around my eyes, nose and chin hydrated. And then, I put this cream and leave it on. It REALLY gives you even skin tone after application, and lightens the dark spots. It gives UV protection too. But if you want, you could leave a dab or two of your favourite sunscreen on face before going out. I won't criticize or take the names, but in my case, it has worked better than other expensive products. Definitely, definitely recommended.

product_name: Biotique Bio Cucumber Pore Tightening Toner, 120ml
review: It's more like an astringent (alcohol based) than a toner.It does clean the skin (pores) very well (no doubt about that).If you have dry skin then don't use it or apply some moisturiser after sometime.My forehead and nose are usually very oily (even in winters) but my cheeks are usually dry. I apply it at night (face and neck) before going to bed. And even though it burns a bit but it does provide freshness.At this price I think it's a good cleanser. I am going to continue using it because my blackheads (on nose) have visibly reduced.

product_name: Biotique Bio Cucumber Pore Tightening Toner, 120ml
review: I bought this for my Oily skin...I am using it morning and night...and its perfect for me...very vesry best for oily skin. I recommend to those who searching real skin tonner for all type of skin. Its removes dirt also.. Use it in your daily life one time..you will see the best result...very good for pores tightening.üòòüòç I'm lovin it

product_name: Nature Trail Lavender Love Hand and Body Lotion-All Natural & Organic Ingredients, No Sulphate & Paraben-200ML
review: I wasn't sure of this product at first but must say it's feels good on skin. Pretty lightweight lotion unlike some other shea butter lotions and it gets fully absorbed on the skin. Leaves a mild fragrance as well. Pretty nice product and beautiful packaging.

product_name: Nature Trail Lavender Love Hand and Body Lotion-All Natural & Organic Ingredients, No Sulphate & Paraben-200ML
review: This hand and body lotion has become an essential part of my daily routine. This product is so amazing. It has a very nice smell of lavender which is just so soothing. Also this product is so very gentle for your body and hands with no sulphate and paraben. I love this product and would recommend it to everyone. My personal favourite body lotion

product_name: Nature Trail Lavender Love Hand and Body Lotion-All Natural & Organic Ingredients, No Sulphate & Paraben-200ML
review: Just like name of the lotion, it's purely lavender love.  I love the lavender fragrance and it smells like that only.  It's a very nourishing and moisturizing hand and body lotion. I m using it from more than a week now and I simply love it.  It is enriched with dead sea minerals, lavender essential oil and plant based ingredients.
